question:
A telegram channel I subscribe to sends sports picks Via images. Like to have a continual process that will extract the images, pick out the text, and then store the picks. The picks are from many different handicappers on many different sports.
Once the picks ares saved, then compile them into a trending list of picks to give weight to the picks most picked by the handicappers. 
This had to be every day, as new picks for games come daily.
Give a name to this system and show me a folder layout

Phase 2 is a reporting and display system
Phase 3 is scoring the picks with results
Modify ALL the previous files with file names and location in the directory.
explain TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN=your_telegram_bot_token_here

I don't want the entire history of the channel. Just the last 7 days. When a new post is made, I need the script to download it and process it. The script will just run in the background.

The idea is that the system would scrape the picks from the images, then build a consciousness from the picks. I should get a report every 20 minutes if there are any new picks; otherwise, stay silent. Use the TheLineWeaverBot to send me the reports in a chat channel that only I and my friends subscribe to.
Ok, there are a lot of files in this project; most are now obsolete. What are the relevant files to keep and run?
update the README.md
